name: sop-ecosystem-poc
description: Proof of concept for a graph-based, modular SOP management system using docs-as-code methodology

scripts.lint:md: markdownlint --config .markdownlint.json sops/*.md sops/**/*.md README.md SETUP.md CONTRIBUTING_GUIDE.md DEPLOYMENT.md ARCHITECTURE.md
scripts.lint:md:fix: markdownlint --config .markdownlint.json --fix sops/*.md sops/**/*.md README.md SETUP.md CONTRIBUTING_GUIDE.md DEPLOYMENT.md ARCHITECTURE.md
scripts.spellcheck: cspell sops/**/*.md README.md SETUP.md CONTRIBUTING_GUIDE.md DEPLOYMENT.md ARCHITECTURE.md
scripts.check:all: npm run lint:md && npm run spellcheck && npm run validate && npm run validate:schema
scripts.reports:all: npm run compliance:report && npm run pdf:generate && npm run training:generate
